amendment.description: To authorize United Service Organizations, Incorporated (USO) to procure supplies and services from the General Services Administration supplies and services on the Federal Supply Schedule.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3199 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3199 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To authorize United Service Organizations, Incorporated (USO) to procure supplies and services from the General Services Administration supplies and services on the Federal Supply Schedule.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3199 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3199 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
